analysis.description:
SmartInvestments._updateReferrals (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#231-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _newInvestorId == _refId

SmartInvestments._updateReferrals (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#231-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _newInvestorId == _refId
SmartInvestments.deposit (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#288-303) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- addressToInvestorId[msg.sender] == 0

SmartInvestments._distributeReferrers has external calls inside a loop:
	- investorIdToAddress[referrerId].transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#263)
Parameter '_sum' of Investments.getRefPercents (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#133) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_index' of Investments.getRefPercentsByIndex (/unique_chucks/36/0x99221ad4b9da43016569cf8cb17df5cf04fe4155.sol#142) is not in mixedCase
